Bottled Soul.NAME: Bottled Soul
Bottled Soul.FLAVOR: Looking inside you see the shadow of your formar self.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose an #yExhaust card. Whenever you play that card, it no longer #yExhausts.

Golems Mask.NAME: Golem's Mask
Golems Mask.FLAVOR: Just like the golem, slow and steady.
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of combat, gain #yGolem's #yMight.

Lychee Nut.NAME: Lychee Nut
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, lose #b25% of your max HP. At the start of combat gain #b3 #yRegen.

Cupcake.NAME: Cupcake
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, after #b6 cards played, all cards cost #b1 more energy.
Gain [R] at the start of each turn.
Gain [G] at the start of each turn.
Gain [B] at the start of each turn.

Magic Flask.NAME: Magic Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: At campfires, the rest option may now be taken for free. After #b3 uses the flask is no longer useable.

Cubic Diamond.NAME: Cubic Diamond
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, replace your starter relic with a random starter relic.

Midas Blood.NAME: Midas Blood
Midas Blood.FLAVOR: Taking damage never felt so good.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take HP damage, gain #b2 gold.

Freezer.NAME: Freezer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #ychannel #b1 #yFrost orb.

Beetle Shell.NAME: Beetle Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10th time you gain #yBlock, gain double the #yBlock.

Burning Sword.NAME: Burning Sword
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 #yStrength.

Broken Mirror.NAME: Broken Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b3 #yReflection.

Spectral Dust.NAME: Spectral Dust
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an #yEthereal card is #yExhausted, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy.

Holy Water.NAME: Holy Water
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, remove #b2 #yBlights. (This excludes Spear of Blight and Shield of Blight)

Blanks Blanky.NAME: Blank's Blanky
DESCRIPTIONS: When resting at Rest Sites, heal to full.

Lucky Rock.NAME: Lucky Rock
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you play an attack card, you have a #b5% chance to gain #yCritical.

Joker Card.NAME: Joker Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10th card you play is played twice.
